title: 96/41/EC: Council Decision of 8 January 1996 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 8 January 1996 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions (96/41/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
1. Mr Jean-Pierre Grafé is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Liénard for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 1998.
2. Mr Hervé Hasquin is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Thys for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 January 1996.
For the Council
The President
W. LUCCHETTI
(1) OJ No L 31, 4. 2. 1994, p. 29.
